quest.name: Clutch Devastation
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Kallias is supposed to be keeping an eye on the creations.
objectives: Search the daidalion nests for eggs.
Deliver the daidalion egg to Kallias.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Oh... So much to do, so little time!

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Ah! A volunteer! How would you like to earn the respect and gratitude of Elpis's most gifted researcher? I require assistance in gathering eggs, a simple task, really.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Egg gathering? The very reason I came here!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: If it's so simple, why don't you do it yourself?

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Excellent! Why, I sense your social standing rising even as we speak!

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: My word! I wasn't expecting such impertinence from a mere familiar! But being the forgiving and generous soul that I am, I shall accept you into my service regardless.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Ahem. To business, then. I seek daidalion eggs, that I may ascertain their ability to produce and raise offspring.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: One somewhat disconcerting trait of these winged wonders is their proclivity for laying eggs here, there, and everywhere. That is the reason why I'm finding it rather difficult to keep track of the damnable things.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: I've neither the time nor inclination to go chasing after them myself, but I'm sure you don't mind. If the parents take offense at you pinching their eggs, you have my permission to slay them if need be.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: If I don't see you again, I shall assume you've fallen fowl of an angry bird. Haha!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have discovered a daidalion egg. Deliver it to Kallias to free yourself from his service.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There are no eggs to be found here...

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: I assume you haven't returned empty-handed?

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Splendid! I now have ample evidence that the daidalion are breeding as expected.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Then, all we need do is wait for the concept to be officially approved.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: But wait! If even a mediocre familiar such as you can steal their eggs, how are they supposed to propagate in the wild?

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: No, no, this will never do. We shall have to find a way to improve their natural defenses against such threats. Two heads, perhaps? Fire-breath? Cover their eggs in spikes? Hmm... That might make them rather tricky to lay...

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text: Well, it's certainly given me food for thought. I shall have to discuss this with the others.

dialogue.name: KALLIAS
dialogue.text:
Oh, are you still here? I suppose a word of thanks is in order.
Thanks.
...There, satisfied?
